evidence_example.title: Easylab Board Demo
evidence_example.small_descr: This is the demo to test the Easylab board devices.
evidence_example.long_descr:
A demo that demostrates the functions for:
  • Leds;
  • Buzzer;
  • Timer;
  • ADC;
  • PWM;
  • UART;
At the beginning the User configure the PWM and the ADC channels, and the desired voltage value that analog input should match, through serial communication. Then, using a simple cable, the user can connect the analogic output (AOx for PWM channel x) to the AD converter (ANx for ADC channel x). The value measured by the AD converter is then transmitted to the PC (tested with putty.exe).
